name: Keep IT Alive (gronken)
description:
Keep IT Alive

Is a short adventure game made for Ludum game Jam 46. 

Plott:

In the dark forest of Faroffistan Dr.Frank Einstein 

is about to finish his new creation: 
The Monster (v IT 0.3321 alpha)

But he is still missing some key parts, he needs to 
search his catacombs for the things he need.

Find the pieces missing and bring them back to 
the laboratory, but hurry before the battery dies.

Made with Monogame, Pyxel, BeepBox and Love

Made by Mattias A Pallin, Jonatan Berglund och Royne Berglund.
